text: Zhang Tonglei (born 5 September 1993) is a Chinese wheelchair basketball player. She is a member of the China women's national wheelchair basketball team and the Guangdong Province team. She won the silver medal at the 2020 Summer Paralympics, and the gold medal at the 2018 Asian Para Games. At the 2018 Women's World Wheelchair Basketball Championship she finished fourth. == References == == Other websites == * Zhang Tonglei, great, the Chinese wheelchair women's basketball team defeated the United States to enter the final - iMedia (min.news) Category:1993 births Category:Chinese wheelchair basketball players Category:Living people Category:Paralympic silver medalists for China
title: Zhang Tonglei
